parisara amathya padawiya hobawana lowa ekama rajya nayakaya shri lanka janadhipathiwaraya bawa sandahan kala mangala samarawira amathyawaraya, parisaraya yanu eksath jathinge nyaya pathrayeth ihalinma pawathina wishayayak bawath penwa dunneya.

prasiddha rangum palaka mandalaye anumathiya labu dinaya padaka kota thiragatha kirimata niyamitha chithrapata nama lekhanayak sansthawa prasiddha kota naha.wada nimawu eheth thawamath thiragatha kala nohaki wu chithrapatawala adhyakshawaru, nishpadakawaru eeta madihath wena lesa sanstha sabhapathiwaraya illimak kala.
me dolahak gana mama kiyawapu paripurnama ek satahanak.
miniha kude wate karakunata harigiye na.
krida amathyanshaye lekamwarayagen samanwitha abhiyachana mandalayakda ee sandaha pathkara thibena athara ehi samajikayan ganana hathaki.

1977 mathiwaranayata tharanga kala drawida eksath wimukthi peramuna wenama rajyayak pilibanda mathawadaya idiripath karamin aasana 23kata tharanga kara aasana 18k dina gaththeya.ehidi parlimenthuwe pa්radhana wipakshaya bawata da path wiya. 1978 warshaye nawa wyawasthawak sampadanaya kirime di eksath jathika pakshaya mulin porondu wu paridi sarwa pakshika sammelanayak kandawimata katayuthu kale natha.
peraki ratawala widesha amathiwarun nowa janadhipathiwarun paminiyath kotinta erehi satana nawathwannata me rate janathawa aanduwata ida denne natha.
wenawa kiyala dannawa athine.aapahu apata

tipar rathayak niwasata kadawadime siddhiyen nagarika manthriwarayage puthun dedenada gnyathi diyaniyath miyayayi kaduwela - sugath premathilaka kaduwela nagarika manthri chandrasena palihena mahathage nawagamuwe pihiti niwasata pasugiyada tipar rathayak kada wadimen barapathala thuwala laba rohalgathawa siti winduli palihena (4) namathi nagarika manthriwarayage gnyathi diyaniyada eeye (11 wanida) sawasa miyagiyaya.

matha kalaye shri lankawe sanwardhanaya pilibanda awabodhaya tharamak apahadiliya.waraya, guwan thotupola, widuli balagara, ha wenath yatithala pahasukam wenuwen sanwardhana katayuthuwalata sambandha wi atha.

aththatama uu dannawatath wada daha gunayak katha kala.

enam unwahanse wishwasa karana aakarayata sadacharathmaka parisarayak nirmanaya karaganima sandaha wana unwahansege dayakathwaya ee thula laba di thibe.
eeta amatharawa ladaruwekuge mana wardhanaya sadaha kala yuthu mulika katayuthu pilibadawa da me wishayedi iganwe.
